Package gate.creole.ontology.ocat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationAction
    This class provides the GUI implementation for creating/changing/deleting annotations from the text.
    AnnotationEditor  
    CheckRenderer
    Description: This class provides the renderer for the Ontology Tree Nodes.
    ComboRenderer
    Description: This class provides the renderer for the Ontology Tree Nodes.
    FeaturesEditor  
    OntologyTreeListener
    Description: This class listens events on tree selection
    OntologyTreePanel
    This class provides a GUI frame for the OCAT tool, where one of the components is the OntologyTree, the other one is Ontology Options and so on.
    OntologyViewer
    In this class we implement the basic structure of the ontology viewer Which includes the total ontologies that has been loaded in the system option for the new ontology, if someone wishes to load it into the system the ontology viewer (which displays all the conetps) Ontology instance viewer and the instance attribute viewer
    OntologyViewerOptions
    Description: This class Provides options window to set the options for Ontology Viewer
    Utils
